efficientist.desc: A term assigned to one that seeks to become more efficient in their daily life.

individual-projects.desc: Provides tips on making individual projects more maintainable.

motivation-killers.desc: Experiences with activities we indulge in that can be detrimental to one’s motivation.

multitasking.desc: An overview of the popular idea and why it’s not always the best choice.

restrictions.desc: The main tool in combatting impulsiveness, a problem leading to a decrease in motivation.

school.desc: A mandatory institution whose ideas and philosophies I strongly oppose.

self-control.desc: A factor in our lives that is becoming more prevalent as new distractions and temptations emerge.

self-study.desc: Studying on one’s own is become a more needed skill while being more seldom developed at the same time.
